authors: Daniel D., John B., Shawn Abreu, John D. updated and combined by Sebouh K.
instructions:
Contact Sebouh K. at skuwed @ gmail . com (without the spaces) for any question or bug reports. Black Crusade Advanced API is an API enabled character sheet for pro subscription gamemasters.

It requires:
* The [Degrees of Success javascripts](https://github.com/Pixizz/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Black%20Crusade%20Advanced%20API/scripts/DegreesSkillBC.js) written by Jack D and modified by Sebouh K
*The [Weapon Degree of Success javascript](https://github.com/Pixizz/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Black%20Crusade%20Advanced%20API/scripts/WeaponScriptBC.js) written by Sebouh K
*The [Characteristic Degrees of Success javascript](https://github.com/Pixizz/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Black%20Crusade%20Advanced%20API/scripts/CharacteristicScriptBC.js) written by Sebouh K
*The [Peril of the Warp Table javascript](https://github.com/Pixizz/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Black%20Crusade%20Advanced%20API/scripts/PerilTable.js) written by Sebouh K
*The [Psychic Phenomenon Table javascript](https://github.com/Pixizz/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Black%20Crusade%20Advanced%20API/scripts/PsyTable.js) written by Sebouh K
*The [Ammo Count Api Script](https://github.com/shdwjk/Roll20API/blob/master/Ammo/Ammo.js) by Aaron C. Meadow
